Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires contact be made with the complainant to verify restoration of service before concluding an investigation
Summary: Requires the New York City department of housing preservation and development to make contact with the complainant to verify restoration of service before concluding an investigation into a violation of heat and hot water service requirements.
LawCode: Add ยง27-2033.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring contact be made with the complainant to verify restoration of service before concluding an investigation
